history.proof: intros E P. unfold INC. intros x H. apply IN_sound_left with (Sing x). - shelve. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (E : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), INC (Comp E P) E

Premises:
Comp = fun X : Ens => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => (Ens -> Prop) -> Ens) (fun (A : Type) (f : A -> Ens) (_ : A -> (Ens -> Prop) -> Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop) => sup (sig A (fun x : A => P (f x))) (fun X0 : sig A (fun x : A => P (f x)) => sig_rect A (fun x : A => P (f x)) (fun _ : sig A (fun x : A => P (f x)) => Ens) (fun (x : A) (_ : P (f x)) => f x) X0)) X : Ens -> (Ens -> Prop) -> Ens Arguments Comp _ _%function_scope
INC = fun E1 E2 : Ens => forall E : Ens, IN E E1 -> IN E E2 : Ens -> Ens -> Prop
Inductive Ens : Type := sup : forall A : Type, (A -> Ens) -> Ens Arguments sup _%type_scope _%function_scope
Paire = fun E E' : Ens => sup bool (fun H : bool => bool_rect (fun _ : bool => Ens) E E' H) : Ens -> Ens -> Ens
INC_EQ : forall E E' : Ens, INC E E' -> INC E' E -> EQ E E'
INC_tran : forall E E' E'' : Ens, INC E E' -> INC E' E'' -> INC E E''
INC_sound_left : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E E' -> INC E E'' -> INC E' E''
INC_sound_right : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> INC E E' -> INC E E''
EQ_INC : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> INC E E'
INC_refl : forall E : Ens, INC E E
Sing = fun E : Ens => Paire E E : Ens -> Ens
sup : forall A : Type, (A -> Ens) -> Ens
EQ = fun X : Ens => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Ens -> Prop) (fun (A : Type) (_ : A -> Ens) (eq1 : A -> Ens -> Prop) (X0 : Ens) => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Prop) (fun (B : Type) (g : B -> Ens) (_ : B -> Prop) => (forall x : A, EXType B (fun y : B => eq1 x (g y))) /\ (forall y : B, EXType A (fun x : A => eq1 x (g y)))) X0) X : Ens -> Ens -> Prop
tout_vide_est_Vide : forall E : Ens, (forall E' : Ens, IN E' E -> F) -> EQ E Vide
IN_Sing_EQ : forall E E' : Ens, IN E (Sing E') -> EQ E E'
IN_sound_right : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> IN E E' -> IN E E''
IN_sound_left : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E E' -> IN E E'' -> IN E' E''
Vide_est_vide : forall E : Ens, IN E Vide -> F
ssrbool.and4_rect : forall (P1 P2 P3 P4 : Prop) (P : Type), (P1 -> P2 -> P3 -> P4 -> P) -> ssrbool.and4 P1 P2 P3 P4 -> P
ssrbool.and4_rec : forall (P1 P2 P3 P4 : Prop) (P : Set), (P1 -> P2 -> P3 -> P4 -> P) -> ssrbool.and4 P1 P2 P3 P4 -> P
EQ_refl : forall E : Ens, EQ E E
Paire_IN : forall E E' A : Ens, IN A (Paire E E') -> EQ A E \/ EQ A E'
IN_Paire_left : forall E E' : Ens, IN E (Paire E E')
IN_Sing : forall E : Ens, IN E (Sing E)
IN_Paire_right : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Paire E E')
EXType_ind : forall (P : Type) (Q : P -> Prop) (P0 : Prop), (forall x : P, Q x -> P0) -> EXType P Q -> P0
ssrbool.prop_on2 : forall T1 T2 T3 : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T2 -> forall (f : T1 -> T2) (Pf : (T1 -> T2) -> T3) (P : T1 -> T1 -> Prop), ssreflect.phantom T3 (Pf f) -> ssreflect.phantom Prop (forall x y : T1, P x y) -> Prop
F_rect : forall (P : F -> Type) (f : F), P f
F_rec : forall (P : F -> Set) (f : F), P f
F_ind : forall (P : F -> Prop) (f : F), P f
EXTypei : forall (P : Type) (Q : P -> Prop) (x : P), Q x -> EXType P Q
Ens_rec : forall P : Ens -> Set, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup A e)) -> forall e : Ens, P e
Ens_sind : forall P : Ens -> SProp, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup A e)) -> forall e : Ens, P e
Ens_ind : forall P : Ens -> Prop, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup A e)) -> forall e : Ens, P e
Ens_rect : forall P : Ens -> Type, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup A e)) -> forall e : Ens, P e
sig_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : sig A P -> Type), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist A P x p)) -> forall s : sig A P, P0 s
IN = fun E1 E2 : Ens => match E2 with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ E1 (f y)) end : Ens -> Ens -> Prop
Ring_polynom.ropp_ext_Proper : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req req) ropp
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> sig A P Arguments sig _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments exist _%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive EXType (P : Type) (Q : P -> Prop) : Prop := EXTypei : forall x : P, Q x -> EXType P Q Arguments EXType _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments EXTypei _%type_scope _%function_scope
Ring_theory.ARmul_1_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul x rI) x
Ring_theory.ARmul_0_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul x rO) rO
Ring_polynom.radd_ext_Proper : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) radd

```                                                    
intros E P.
unfold INC.
intros x H.
unfold Comp.
apply EXTypei with x.
apply sig_rrect.
apply IN_sound_left with (Sing x).
apply IN_Sing.
apply IN_sound_right with E.
apply EQ_refl.
apply H.
```

original: intros E P. unfold INC. intros x H. unfold Comp. apply EXTypei with x. apply sig_rrect. apply IN_sound_left with (Sing x). apply IN_Sing. apply IN_sound_right with E. apply EQ_refl. apply H.
